content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Greetings, Hassan. Thank you for considering my apartment for rental. I'm sure it would be a great fit for you. As for the rental price, I'm open to negotiating. What do you have in mind?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am looking for the lowest possible price.

I am a student, and I want to be on good terms with my landlord.

I am dependable and responsible, and I want to make sure that the apartment is well-maintained.

I am also looking for a long-term lease agreement.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Understood, Hassan. I appreciate your interest in the apartment and your willingness to negotiate. As a landlord, I want to make sure that I am getting the best possible return on my investment. However, I am also willing to work with you to find a mutually beneficial agreement.

Based on the size of the apartment, I was thinking a monthly rental price of around €700-€800 would be reasonable. This price takes into account the costs of utilities and other expenses that you will incur as a tenant. Additionally, a long-term lease agreement would provide stability for both of us, and I would be more likely to consider a lower rental price if you were willing to commit to a longer lease term.

What do you think? Are these prices within your budget, and are you willing to commit to a longer lease agreement?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of €750 per month.

I am willing to commit to a long-term lease agreement.

I will make sure to maintain the apartment well and pay all utilities on time.

Thank you for your understanding, Mister Heine.

I will sign the lease agreement as soon as possible.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Thank you, Hassan. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and your commitment to a long-term lease agreement. I'm glad that we were able to reach an agreement that works for both of us.

Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns about the lease agreement or the apartment. I'm happy to help in any way I can.

Once you have signed the lease agreement, please let me know so that I can process it and make the necessary arrangements for the handover of the apartment.

Thank you again for choosing my property, and I look forward to working with you as your landlord.
name: Heinrich Heine
